en.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to your photo library so you can attach images to tasks and notes (e.g., a screenshot or receipt).
en.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow saving images to your photo library when you export or download images from BlotzTask (e.g., a shared task card).
en.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow camera access so you can take a photo and attach it to a task or note (e.g., a document, whiteboard, or receipt).
en.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: BlotzTask uses speech recognition to turn your voice into text for creating tasks and notes.
en.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: BlotzTask uses the microphone for voice input so you can dictate tasks and notes. Audio is used only for speech-to-text and is not stored.
en.NSMotionUsageDescription: BlotzTask uses motion data for an optional shake interaction in the app (e.g., to animate capsule-toy style effects). Motion data is not stored.
en.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BlotzTask uses your location to provide location-aware features when you choose to use them. Your location is not stored.

zh-Hans.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: 允许访问相册，以便你将图片添加到任务和笔记中（例如截图或收据）。
zh-Hans.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: 允许将图片保存到相册，方便你从 BlotzTask 导出或下载图片（例如分享的任务卡片）。
zh-Hans.NSCameraUsageDescription: 允许访问相机，以便你拍照并添加到任务或笔记中（例如文档、白板或收据）。
zh-Hans.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: BlotzTask 使用语音识别将你的语音转为文字，用于创建任务和笔记。
zh-Hans.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: BlotzTask 使用麦克风进行语音输入，方便你口述任务和笔记。音频仅用于语音转文字，不会被存储。
zh-Hans.NSMotionUsageDescription: BlotzTask 使用运动数据来提供可选的摇一摇交互（例如胶囊玩具风格的动画效果）。运动数据不会被存储。
zh-Hans.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BlotzTask 在你选择使用相关功能时获取定位信息，用于提供位置相关能力。你的位置信息不会被存储。
